1:
--------------------
Text: Memorial Parkway (Huntsville):  It, in whole or in part, follows U.S. Route 231, U.S. Route 431, U.S. Route 72, and State Route 53 through the Huntsville city limits.

Triplets:<Memorial Parkway
2:
--------------------
Text: Memorial Parkway (Huntsville):  It is a limited access road through most of Huntsville city proper, providing exits to the frontage road which allow access to road intersections, as well as businesses and residences along the route.
Triplets:<Memorial Parkway
3:
--------------------
Text: Memorial Parkway (Huntsville):  Both the limited access and frontage roads are referred to as Memorial Parkway.
